resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/102922</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>102922</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087553</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Edubuntu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Edubuntu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Edubuntu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Edubuntu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Edubuntu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Edubuntu</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Edubuntu</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The Edubuntu Linux distribution brings the spirit of Ubuntu to schools, through its customised school environment. The current version of Edubuntu is aimed at classroom use, and future versions of Edubuntu will expand to other educational usage, such as university use.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Edubuntu Linux Verteilung holt den Geist von 
Ubuntu zu den Schulen, durch seine kundenspezifische Schulumgebung. 
Die aktuelle Version von Edubuntu ist angestrebter 
Klassenzimmergebrauch, und zukünftige Versionen von Edubuntu 
erweitern zu anderem pädagogischem Verbrauch, wie 
Universitätsgebrauch.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La distribution d'Edubuntu Linux apporte l'esprit 
d'Ubuntu aux écoles, par son environnement scolaire personnalisé. 
La version en cours d'Edubuntu est utilisation visée de salle 
de classe, et les futures versions d'Edubuntu augmenteront à l'autre 
utilisation éducative, telle que l'utilisation d'université.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A distribuição de Edubuntu Linux traz o 
espírito de Ubuntu às escolas, através de seu ambiente de escola 
customised. A versão atual de Edubuntu é uso visado da sala de
aula, e as versões futuras de Edubuntu expandirão ao outro uso 
educacional, tal como o uso da universidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La distribuzione di Edubuntu Linux porta lo 
spirito di Ubuntu alle scuole, attraverso il relativo ambiente 
scolastico personalizzato. La versione corrente di Edubuntu è 
uso puntato su dell'aula e le versioni future di Edubuntu si 
espanderanno all'altro uso educativo, quale uso dell'università.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η διανομή Edubuntu Linux φέρνει το πνεύμα 
Ubuntu στα σχολεία, μέσω του προσαρμοσμένου σχολικού 
περιβάλλοντός της. Την παρούσα έκδοση Edubuntu στοχεύουν
στη χρήση τάξεων, και οι μελλοντικές εκδόσεις Edubuntu θα 
επεκταθούν σε άλλη εκπαιδευτική χρήση, όπως η πανεπιστημιακή 
χρήση.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La distribución de Edubuntu Linux trae el alcohol
de Ubuntu a las escuelas, a través de su ambiente de escuela 
modificado para requisitos particulares. La versión actual de 
Edubuntu es uso dirigido de la sala de clase, y las versiones futuras 
de Edubuntu se ampliarán al otro uso educativo, tal como uso de la 
universidad.</string>
          </description>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765087553</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">No License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>102922</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/matters/edubuntu</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
